verses.translation: When there comes Allah’s help and the conquest[1],

verses.arabic_text: وَرَأَيۡتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدۡخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفۡوَاجٗا
verses.translation: and you see people entering Allah’s religion in multitudes,

verses.arabic_text: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابَۢا
verses.translation: then glorify the praise of your Lord, and ask His forgiveness. Indeed, He is ever Accepting of Repentance.
